text:
Elfriede Ott (11 June 1925 – 12 June 2019) was an Austrian actress, singer, stage director and teacher. She was born in Vienna. Her career begam in 1944. She was known for her roles on the long running television series "Hallo – Hotel Sacher... Portier!" and in the 2010 movie "The Unintentional Kidnapping of Mrs. Elfriede Ott".
From 1985 to 2004 she gave theatre lectures at the Music and Arts University of the City of Vienna.
Ott died one day after her 94th birthday in Vienna on 12 June 2019.

annotations.surface_form: The Unintentional Kidnapping of Mrs. Elfriede Ott
